well, obviously, Pepsi is better than coke, look at the pole results!! Not that it is relevant or anything, but if it matters, PEPSI is better. I counted up the posts for both, and I came up with PEPSI-17 and COKE-3. (so I don't know how to count, I was homeschooled, lol)
 
 Besides here are some facts about that nasty stuff (coke) that you call soda:
 -if you get battery acid build-up around the connections on your car battery, pour some coke on there, melts it right off!
 -if you get oil or grease stains on your clothes, pour a can of coke in the washer, gets the stains right out!
 -if you want to get blood off the floor, ground, sidewalk, pavement, pour some coke on there. (Cops really do carry a 2 liter bottle of it in their trunk to clean up after traffic accidents)
 -if you don't like to scrub the toilet, pour a can of coke in there and let it sit for 15 minutes and flush. Voila- sparkling clean!!
 
 Do you really want to drink that stuff??
 
 By the way, I was just kidding about not knowing how to count, but I really was homeschooled.
